text: Federico Chiesa (born 25 October 1997) is an Italian football player. He plays as a winger or forward for Liverpool FC and the Italy national team. He is the son of former football player Enrico Chiesa. == References == Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Liguria Category:Association football midfielders Category:Association football forwards Category:Sportspeople from Genoa Category:Italy at UEFA Euro 2020
title: Federico Chiesa
